name: Telegraph Crosswords
synopsis: Play crossword puzzles from the 'Telegraph' like you've never played them before! Discover a whopping 500 puzzles of multiple types. You're in for many hours of gameplay! With its handy interface and intuitive controls, this game transfigures the classic pen-and-paper experience. Notable features include: - A huge selection of quick puzzles, cryptic puzzles and general knowledge puzzles! - Registration of best times in the Hall of Fame. - Interactive hints prevent you from being stuck! - Auto-save as you go: you can stop and resume a puzzle at any time!
